messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] To Unschoolers From Tamie: Special message to my wonderful friend!
messages.msgSnippet: No offense, but I hate these things because you can t get out of them without following all their links.  And, there is no way of knowing in advance which ones
messages.messageBody:
No offense, but I hate these things because you can't get out of them
without following all their links. And, there is no way of knowing in
advance which ones are the ones that are selling half a dozen things.

Lynda

----------
> From: Tamie <Tamilooch@...>
> To: Unschoolers <unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
> Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] To Unschoolers From Tamie: Special message
to my wonderful friend!
> Date: Thursday, April 13, 2000 9:14 AM
>
> Dear Unschoolers,
>
> Your friendship is very important to me. I thought of you when I saw this
special web page. Click to http://smartbotpro.net/angel
>
> Hello everyone. I thought this might cheer up all us sad pubery moms.
Actually it such a beautiful poem it might cheer everyone up! Thanks for
all the support. Tamie
>
> The web page is at:
>
> http://smartbotpro.net/angel/
>
> or <a href="http://smartbotpro.net/angel">click here!</a>
>
> They also show you a cool surprise after you pass it on to more friends!
>
> Please reply back.
>
> Tamie
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> eLerts
